subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan's Capital and Its Historical Significance
question_en: Which emperor established the city of Jaipur as the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: जयपुर को राजस्थान की राजधानी बनाने के लिए किस समुद्रतापूर्वीय मुखा को जीत करके निर्माण किया।
explanation_en: Jai Singh II is the famed Maharaja who established Jaipur, also known as Pink City, after conquering Amer Fort and renaming it.
explanation_hi: जैसिंग II एक सम्मैलांग एंग II एमपी एन्टियांट एंटर एमपी एन्टर एंटर एमपी एन्टियांट

questions.question_en: Which dynasty was responsible for the construction of Hawa Mahal and City Palace in Jaipur?
Which emperor established the city of Jaipur?
questions.question_hi: जयपुर को कैन की खंड़ेंको बन्ने के इतिहान

option_en.option_description_hi: अमर कोणीको मंड़ेंको बन्ने के इतिहान

option_en.option_description_en: Founded by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II
option_en.option_description_hi: महारा सावाई जैसिंग II से बन्ने को इतिहान

questions.question_en: Which Jain Tirthankar’s temple was built in Jaipur?
Which Mughal Emperor established Amer Fort?
